description:
Gross investment in tangible fixed assets

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services

Definition:
Investments also include advance payments for fixed assets
under construction (equipment and buildings). Investments do
not include additions resulting from business mergers.
Gross investment in the construction, conversion and
extension of buildings does not comprise routine repair and
maintenance costs.
Gross investment in land includes the related tax on
acquisition of real estate.

Gross investment in machinery, equipment and vehicles refers
to all new and used tangible fixed assets which were
purchased by third parties or were part of own-account
production in the reference period. The products purchased
are to be valued at purchase prices (including transport and
installation costs and the cost associated with the transfer
of ownership), while own-account products are to be valued
at production costs. Expenses related to extension,
conversion, modernisation, alteration and renovation are to
be included, while routine maintenance costs are not.
